title: Client keeps disconnecting
body: Not sure what it is but my client seems to disconnect itself every minute or so and it gets even worse in champion select disconnecting almost every 5 seconds. Highly doubt it's anything to with my internet because it says connected when it disconnected and also I browse my web and watch videos during the disconnection without any trouble. Any help Is greatly appreciated because this is really frustrating.

replies.body:
When the client disconnects in champ select, it's usually caused by the client dropping its connection to the matchmaking servers. This is usually the result of network configurations that prevent the client from maintaining a solid link to the servers. I recommend checking our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the list of common solutions.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
